verbs.description: attorney general candidates spar over same - sex adoption campaign ads [V: dueling] ads in the attorney general race are in constant rotation on tv raoul has run three ads which claim harold said at age 19 that she 'd prefer a child be placed in a foster home with abusive straight parents over being placed in a home with a loving gay couple supreme court of the united states harold erika harold kwame raoul
